item.title: Re: Update on backgrounds + favored soul
item.content:encoded:
While not in my list of backgrounds that I was given to be able to work on them, Ive found that EGW (Explorers guide to wildemount) also apparently has backgrounds aswell.

Should the Wildemount backgrounds recieve pages? I believe so, since they are an official setting for 5e now that wotc has released a setting book for it.

Edit: Disregard. The majority of wildemount backgrounds are renamed/alterations to base game backgrounds. The unique backgrounds already have pages

item.title: Re: Update on backgrounds + favored soul
item.content:encoded:
Hm, yeah that could make sense. For example, the 'deep delver' and 'under dark experience' could link to the same 'Background:Out-Of-the-Abyss' page, but that may end up being confusing and ive already made pages for them so… and it should be fine for them to have their own pages. I mean, afterall, they are kinda weird, since they are essentially variant backgrounds which are designed to go with any background… So I think leaving them with their own pages is good

As for the backgrounds, ive progressed through about half of them, and I should be capable at progressing at a slightly faster pace from here on out due to having an abundance of free time upon me.

Ill make a 'All the backgrounds are finished post' once they are all completed, rather than flooding the discussions with individual 'page completed' posts. Also, that way the frontpage can be updated all at once, and that should be pretty cool to see a sudden large expansion.

I look forward to being able to share them all with you soon :)

item.title: Re: Update on backgrounds + favored soul
item.content:encoded:
I'm going to work on the Backgrounds section of the main page later this week. I'll get it split up by setting and see if anything else makes sense.

If you look at the link for the 'Spy' background for the main page, it actually just links to the 'Criminal' background and automatically scrolls the page to the Spy variant section.

item.title: Re: Update on backgrounds + favored soul
item.content:encoded:
I think that the Revenant works better as its own page under our UA section than as being listed as a subrace for the few examples listed in the original UA it came from. The article mentions how there's no subraces for half-elves and half-orcs (which we know is wrong) and doesn't mention the other races that it could theoretically apply to (elves, dwarves, and the variety of races that were released after the article was published), so keeping it as its own standalone page works better imo.

Our Backgrounds section could certainly use some adjustment, separating the generic backgrounds (fisher, hermit, etc) from the setting specific backgrounds (the Ravnica guilds and most of the backgrounds that still need to be added). I think that formatting it to match our Races section might work, but that's a decision for Fredbob or the admin to make.
